author: Associated Press
title: Oprah on coronavirus: 'Playing it as safe as I possibly can'
description: The 66-year-old entertainment icon said she has been quarantining and practicing social distancing at her home — even if that means longtime partner Stedman Graham has to stay in the guest house.
content:
NEW YORK Oprah Winfrey says shes playing it safe when it comes to the rapidly spreading coronavirus.
The 66-year-old entertainment icon told The Associated Press that she has been quarantining and practicing social distancing at her home even if that means l… [+1477 chars]
